website_summaries.verdict: Great for newcomers and pros alike, this user-friendly model makes it easy to monogram exactly what you have in mind, and its handy USB port makes importing fresh styles a breeze.
pros: Design editing software makes it easy to be creative
cons: A bit on the expensive side, but you’re paying for quality

website_summaries.verdict: A dedicated, easy-to-use embroidery machine with a larger-than-average field that frees you to cover a larger surface area.
pros: Off the charts in terms of performance and dependability
Use the built-in patterns or import your own
View tutorials on the LCD screen for extra help
cons: may be difficult for some people to move
There is a definite learning curve with this feature-rich machine

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect any help
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this machine. All the reviews were fantastic, it is easy to learn, pictures from other users were beautiful, except one problem....mine embroiders like the picture shows. I have contacted Brother many, many times for help. They respond, but only to tell me to read the manual or the on-line help...which I have already done, more than once, yet they continue to send the same "support" answer. So, don't expect much support from Brother if you have issues. If your problem is a simple solution and covered in the manual you will be fine, otherwise - you are on your own.
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, be patient and read your manual!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an older but far more costly machine that expired. Happy with it so far and not hard for me as I had used touch screen etc. Does the job for me! Struggled with the upper threading, specifically the auto threading... One in 10 attempts worked, frustrating to say the least! Yes, the manual is good but I was missing was the guide right above the needle, not just a hook, you need to pull left to get into the channel. You tube Vince Arcuri has numerous videos about this machine , addresses many functions in detail, simplifies what seems complicated.
customer_reviews.author: Nana CHRIS

customer_reviews.title: Stitches perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I have had the se400 for almostv2 years . incredible machine, but I got hoop envy. I didn't need another sewing machine so this perfect. I have put in about 30 hours on in it the last couple of weeks not even a thread break. It is a bigger than the se400 so the embroidery arm does fit into the machine trolley. So I bought an 18.5 inch laptop bag to store the embroidery arm, hoops (I bought a hoop set for it) and other supplies. Light enough to take to classes and sit and sew with the luxury of a larger hoop size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine! I am glad that I purchased separate software so that I can get the most out of this fabulous machine. I found the learning curve to be pretty short, but then again, I am an experienced sewer and designer. I am also incredibly comfortable with software. This is my first embroidery machine and I am so happy.
customer_reviews.author: KRL

customer_reviews.title: I love this machine
customer_reviews.text: I have my PE770 which I love, but I hated the display screen, which basically gave you a dark blur of the design. The screen of the PE800 actually shows the design in color. It runs very smoothly and so far I have used it every single day without a problem. The PE770 has two slots, one for the USB flash drive and one for a card, but the PE800 only has the USB. The hoops are interchangeable with these two machines.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impossible machine
customer_reviews.text: Ok, admittedly I’m a first time embroidery person, but I hate this machine. I wanted a machine to make quilt labels and this has been an exercise in frustration. For every successful label I finally had I took hours of adjusting tension, backing material, and rethreading the machine. Different types of bobbin thread etc. I actually gave up on it tonight and logged into discover that my return period ended a day ago.
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS MACHINE!
customer_reviews.text: Trying to use this machine has been nothing but frustrating! The thread constantly breaks. 4 needles have broken. I thought it was user error. I had a friend who is an avid machine embroiderer come over and she watched me. She corrected what I was doing wrong. We had everything moving right along. Then out of nowhere, another needle breaks. I should have trusted my gut and purchased a good machine!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great machine at any price.
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted embroidery machine since I was a kid. The PE800 is the fourth embroidery machine I have purchased. I could not be happier with my purchase of the PE800 . I only embroider my own designs, so third party graphics files are easy to import and stitched via the software. Just read the manual and try it ... all will be well. Thx RLL @lawlessrll@cox.net
customer_reviews.author: Rodger L Lawless

customer_reviews.title: New Brothers PE 800 is a great machine
customer_reviews.text: I own 3- Brothers 770 and the screens are horrible. I was so glad they came out with one with a colored screen and it has so many great upgrades. I got it for a great price of $443 Love it so much better than my 770s.
customer_reviews.author: pattiann12

customer_reviews.title: Great & affordable
customer_reviews.text: When asking around everyone was directing me to machines that cost as much as my car. Someone reasonable suggested this machine. Since I was just using it for personal gifts and not a business I did not want to spend thousands of dollars. This is a great starter machine & I doubt I will ever outgrow it to simply make nice gifts for family & friends
customer_reviews.author: ASD

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first product and the first time using a embroidery machine. I looked at Babylock and Janome, both excellent machines. I have a Babylock serger and a Janome sewing machine. I own a Brother runway, that I wore out. I wasn’t sure how much I’d use an embroidery machine. Reasons for choosing the Brother PE800: Many very good reviews Price point Ease of use Product loyalty USB port I can grow with this machine. What remains to be seen; is support from Brother “if” needed. Highly recommend this machine.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Brother embroidery Machine
customer_reviews.text: Product is not operational. CLUMPS AND BREAKS thread under the foot and I have to take it apart and remove the tangle.. Have set tension according to Brother and the default continues. 386 754-3744. I am very disappointed that I am not getting the help from Amazon or Brother's with this problem. Since it is only 2 months old there should not be tis kind of problem. I feel you should send me another machine asap.
customer_reviews.author: Bea Bedingfield

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this machine! When it works, it’s great. I have had it since September 5 2018. 3 months and have had to take it to the shop 2 times. I have gotten no help from Brother or Spacebound.
customer_reviews.author: terry

customer_reviews.title: Bad bobbin casing
customer_reviews.text: Just received my Brothers PE 800 embroidery machine on Friday. It’s not working, the needle jams because there’s the bobbin casing (not sure if that’s the correct word) is too loose. I contacted Brother’s about it and they confirmed it should only move about 1⁄8 of and inch NOT over 1⁄2 inch. I’m trying to exchange it for another one. I’m sure it’s just a bad part and I’m hopeful that once it’s exchanged that I can give it a better review.
customer_reviews.author: veamcher

customer_reviews.title: Super cheap and will get the job done.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great embroidery machine for beginners. It is highly recommended that you download a FREE version of the Embrilliance EXPRESS to help you type in words/names, otherwise you'll need to do them one at a time on your embroidery machine. If you are just planning to use and purchase designs already made, this machine will get the job done. I owned a BabyLock ten years ago and for a beginner, it would have been better for me to learn on this PE 800 than to abuse my $5000 machine cause I didn't know what I was doing. Here is my first appliqué. Turned out better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: biokid

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting an embroidery machine for a long time, and the price to feature of this one made it irresistible. It is very easy to use once you figure it out. The user manual is easy to understand and I had perfect results on the very first project. It's easy to change threads, and fairly easy to pick up where you left off if you break either thread or bobbin thread. There is a stitch counter on the display, but also a "cursor" on the pattern that shows you where you are, which makes it a little easier to back up to where the thread broke. If you are using quality thread, it won't happen much.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: It ONLy does embroidery
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product only because it is ONLY an embroidery machine. I did not realize that. I was looking at the model just below. Amazon suggested I upgrade and I was like, fabulous! I could embroider many different sizes- Not just the 4x4 size on the original model I was looking at! Well that was all fine and dandy until I got it and realized as I was unpacking it that there were no feeder feet or a presser foot. Then I looked it up. No sewing. Dang it! Oh well. Next time I won’t be so fast to upgrade. But they returned it super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Rymer

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I read so many wonderful reviews about this machine, and it worked perfectly for the first few weeks, but after that its turned into a lemon. I've had tension issues and skipped stitches since. Can't return the machine because it is past the window, so my only option is to drive an hour and a half away every time it messes up. Would only recommend if you have plenty of time and patience to deal with fixing it every other week. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic embroidering machine!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife for her birthday. She teaches sewing at her school so she has had experience with many makes and models of embroidering machines. She personally loves this one. It's very reliable and well made. Not to finicky when it comes to thread (though higher end thread is better to use.) It is pretty easy to use, I even play with it and was able to figure it out with never having touched an embroidering machine before. The only down side is she wants to embroider all the things lol. She and I highly recommend this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: imposible to return a faulty unit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this machine and the first unit was horrible, the thread would break, it would turn off on its own on the middle of a project so I requested an exchange and it was not available so I started a return and did a second purchase since I initially felt in love with the unit. UPS refused to take it numerous times and I did not have a car to take it my self to be dropped off. Now the time for return is past and I have 2 machines. This is now affecting me financially. I keep trying to get a hold of customer service and I get nowhere.
customer_reviews.author: rgr

customer_reviews.title: The girls told wife “WOW, this is soooo much faster than mine.”
customer_reviews.text: The girls told wife “WOW, this is soooo much faster than mine.” Her sewing group all have Brothers machines but this one is a bit more uptown. There is a learning curve. We downloaded a bunch of templates to my computer and transferred them to a flash drive. Verrry painless.
customer_reviews.author: The SakDaddyTop Contributor: Drums

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the product
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive the machine in a timely matter, however there were many things wrong with the machine. I had to pay $75.00 to get the threader replaced and the bobbin still is not working.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an in home hobby machine that was easy set up and easy to use. This machine has met all my expectations. I do wish I would had bought one that embroidered bigger than a 5x7. I'm afraid I will be ready to upgrade sooner than what I thought I would. I have purchased a few designs and transferred them from computer to thumb drive to my machine, and the simplicity of that is amazing. This was truly the best starter machine for me and economically perfect to make sure that I would enjoy a new hobby. I hope you enjoy it as much as I have!!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Garrett

customer_reviews.title: It’s easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I waited for months for it to be in stock, finally got it. At first it looks a little bit intimidating. After watching tutorials on YouTube, it is quite easy. Now I just need to explore a little more. But it’s fun to watch it do all the hard work. It’s time to personalize my kids’ clothes, backpacks, etc. The draw back is that now I need to invest more on threads and stabilizers. Probably a software later. But I’m so excited!
customer_reviews.author: ho hui

customer_reviews.title: Bruh
customer_reviews.text: Dude, I don't know if it's just my machine but after two months it's completely unusable. Very terrifying noises coming out of it, ruins almost every embroidery project on any type of fabric with all types of stabilizer. The auto-threader was broken when I got it: should've taken that as I sign. I have experimented with variations in tension with the bobbin and top thread but nothing seems to work. A $600 machine shouldn't have a lifespan of two months.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for the price
customer_reviews.text: For a single thread machine you really can’t go wrong. It’s not as noisy as some of the bigger machines and most patterns have “stops” embedded in to give you time to switch thread colors. Very easy to use, easy to thread. I recommend educating yourself on stabilizers before your maiden voyage and ensure your project does not slide under the hoop. You can even do hats on this by “floating” the hat in the hoop. Ok whatcha waiting on...
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with my machine!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my PE800! I keep discovering more and more I can do with it, and the possibilities seem endless! The machine arrived quickly and was packaged very well. It works great! I also purchased additional embroidery hoops and a great starter's kit to go with it, and they are all great! This has opened up a whole new world for me :-)
customer_reviews.author: Natalie G

customer_reviews.title: Amazon "open box"
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two PE-800 at the same time, there were two "open box" machines available. I had researched the PE-800 and I am familiar with both Brother and Baby Lock embroidery machines. I suspected that with an "open box" there would be some stitches on the stitch count... but one machine had 277,502!!! I was suspecting, at most, 10k. This machine also did not have the power cord. I have reached out to Brother, via their website. Other than these two issues, all is good. I will update this review when I hear back from Brother.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine so far.
customer_reviews.text: I have had the Brother PE 800 for about a month. For anyone who is experienced with using a sewing machine, the transition to using the PE800 embroidery machine will be easy and fun. Not sure what the learning curve might be otherwise. My challenge is learning about stabilizers, proper hooping, designs, etc. Practice, practice, practice...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful Customer Service from Amazon and Brother
customer_reviews.text: I owned the PE770 and it was a great machine. Upgraded to the PE800 and have had only had it a month. Brother will not return phone calls and Amazon wants to charge me over $100 for a restocking fee to EXCHANGE IT for one that hopefully works correctly. I am making mask for nurses using this machine and it will not work correctly. MASK FOR NURSES! And neither company will step up and make this issue and product right.
customer_reviews.author: Amie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: Received my machine. Used it once. next time I tried to embroider I could not start because the presser foot needed to be in the "down" position. Which it was. Spent 4 1/2 hours trying to get it to run. Finally called customer support. 37 minutes on hold. Tech finally answered and said "you need to put the pressure foot in the lower position". NSS. Nearest brother authorized repair center if is in Auburn Mass... 1.5 hours away. I think for the price should be more than single use machine.
customer_reviews.author: Capricorn Run Farm

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: It embroidered 6 patterns just fine and on the 7th it started pulling the bobbin thread to the top. I adjusted the bobbin case 3 times and about 2/3 the way through the pattern it did the same thing. Returning it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D Farmer

customer_reviews.title: The machine is Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Today September 17, 2020, I tried my new embroidery machine, and I noticed that some little pieces are missing. I don't the name of the pieces, but I would like the seller to send to me a new little white bag with all parts the showed on the Amazon website. Thank you. I would like the seller to send me the little pieces that are missing, please. This is the second time I wrote to ask for it. I could not put the picture here to show exactly what I m talking about. It's all in a little white bag. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Celia Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my machine about 2 months now. As a complete non sewer, I found it easy to use but had a lot of issues that I believe if I knew how to sew wouldn’t have been issues for me. But now that I’ve worked out all the kinks it’s a good little machine and i use it all of the time. I got a good deal on it so overall it was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah C.

customer_reviews.title: great upgraded entry-level embroidery
customer_reviews.text: takes a little while to set-up patterns on the screen, and a slight learning curve on readying fabrics in the hoop, but this machine is pretty awesome and fun to watch. Some fabrics don't embroider well, namely ones with stretch, but, with practice, this machine will even do those decently. Just plan on paying a few dollars for any really cool embroidery patterns. This is definitely entry-level. If you are able to make your own embroidery files, I think you would want a model up, though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is so easy to use. This is my third embroidery machine. Two different brands. One was good but was not able to do a lot. One I never could get to work. This is my first Brother and it works straight out of the box. I cannot say enough good things about it!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn S.

customer_reviews.title: This was not a PE800
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box I noticed that the product didn't have Users Guide but was even worse it was a PE500. I sure hope they don't try to sell this as a PE800 again. I was in a PE800 box. I was so disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Machine Embroidery at affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine and professional look of embroIdery. If you ate a MAC user you will need to purchase ”Embrillance” software to transfer designs, but user-friendly and you will love as well! Recommend to all!!!
customer_reviews.author: sharon Sobocinski

customer_reviews.title: I love what I am able to create with this machine!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first embroidery machine. I purchased to be able to do appliqué and needed the 5x7 hoop for Accuquilt designs. I purchased in late October and made personalized Christmas presents! I am thrilled it was so easy- I used the built in font for personalized names and I purchased designs that I transferred using the USB connection. I have embroidered on cotton material and pre-made dish clothes, and next will try a polo shirt; I have also used 2 different kind of threads- Florianni and - not sure the other brand name - but purchased at Joann’s store, and both worked fine and looked great!
customer_reviews.author: Julie A

customer_reviews.title: Very good machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine. I have owned larger hooped bigger machines but this one keeps up just as well. It's a little workhorse and i have done a lot with it. I even use it for making vinyl bags with no problems going over multiple layers.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished
customer_reviews.text: Refurbished, advertised as new, had to take it to a repair shop to have it fixed before i could get it to work, repair shop said all the ones online are refurbished
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Quality machine, affordable, easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Great machine in so many ways. Easy threading and bobbin winding Easy to adjust stitch point if bobbin runs out or thread breaks. You can move and resize pattern on your machine. color screen shows thread color as well as #. Great advanced features also. Great for beginner or advanced embroidery crafters. Lighting on surface is also topnotch. Have not discovered any cons with the machine. 5x7 hoop size but will also allow for 4x4 and smaller. I did buy a extra pack of variety hoop sizes from Embroderix and they fit fine (1 is a multi position hoop). After using the PE500, this is a dream come true.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Embroidery for beginners
customer_reviews.text: The whole family is using this machine. My husband has taken it over. My 17 and 12 year old children are crafting with ease. It is user friendly we haven’t had any problems. We have enjoyed learning to use it as a family. Great embroidery machine and easy to use and I got it at a great price. I highly recommended purchasing this machine for a small embroidery business.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi4life

customer_reviews.title: Awesome embroidery manchine! Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Hands down and other website hands down this it the easiest embroidery manchine I've used! Everything is digital and can add multiple projects on the screen! Go look this up and see the difference on what it can do! I use 6 hooks and one is for hats.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick S.

customer_reviews.title: Love This Amazing Machine
customer_reviews.text: This machine is amazing. I've never had an embroidery machine and this one was easy to set up and the instructions on how to use wee easy to follow and after an hour I was embroidering away. Designs are easy to load from the internet. My only complaint is it wasn't delivered in the time it was said it would be. Not product fault, Amazons.
customer_reviews.author: noweaps

customer_reviews.title: My dream was to start my dream business with this embroidery machine
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited to have this embroidery machine, unfortunately after purchasing it, I found out that its not compatible with the excising electrical solutions where I live in the middle east, and was initially produced for US & Europe countries. I had to return it back and currently trying to find alternative from brother which has similar features but with middle east features.
customer_reviews.author: Esra

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Tried using it a couple times to see out some college symbols but nope the card won’t read and you have to buy a separate program that is also horrible to import images.
customer_reviews.author: Master U

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. I spent a few minutes reading the manual and was able to get started embroidering right away. Looks great, works great and I can see this machine enhancing my quilting.
customer_reviews.author: Joann Romans

customer_reviews.title: safety switch activating
customer_reviews.text: I love my Brother pe800, it does beautiful embroidery, but, now I'm having trouble with it. We bought it in March, 2020, and now the arm that pushes the needle down is barely moving. I guess we're headed to a repair shop. This comes at a bad time, only 2 months till Christmas, and I probably won't get a quilt done I was working on. I hope it only needs a deep cleaning, but I can't see anything that needs to be cleaned. So, on to the repair shop.
customer_reviews.author: C. P. hamby

customer_reviews.title: Fun but needs better instructions
customer_reviews.text: Love using this machine. Only problem I had was with tension. Because I’m a longtime sewer, I was able to figure some things out. I found YouTube videos very helpful since machine was bought online and therefore I had no one to consult.
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: SO EASY
customer_reviews.text: I found this machine very easy to use once I figure out how to thread and wind the bobbin. I've even managed to use designs from the web. The only thing is the screen is hard to see until you select one design. I have had no problem with tension as well. Already have a lot of plans for using it.
customer_reviews.author: JKJ

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, great value.
customer_reviews.text: I love this embroidery machine. So much easier to use than my old one, and I found the instructions clear and detailed. I wish it had a few more fonts, especially a script. But the machine itself is a good value for the money. I'm sure I'll have and use it for many years to come. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful machine !
customer_reviews.text: Everything I do just turns out beautiful. I already owned a brother than only had a 4x4 hoop and really wanted something that would stitch out a bigger design. I love this machine ! I have had this since April 2019 so I've owned it over a year with no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a new an bed was just what d larger hoop since May finally there was a price reduction. color screen and wider bed
customer_reviews.author: Gwen McKinley

customer_reviews.title: I love this machine.
customer_reviews.text: I got it just before the pandemic intending to make stuff to sell online. Turns out, I haven't done that but I love this machine just the same. It's easy enough to use and once you start downloading designs from the various websites that have them and the possibilities are endless!
customer_reviews.author: HeyMySock

customer_reviews.title: Could not even get threaded or to work
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to use and would like to send back. Cannot past deadline. Even tho was a Christmas gift. One and half hours of looking at instructions and never could get it to work. The person bought it for for Christmas does not want it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love Brother products....and this one is great. It takes a bit of time and patience to learn the machine....but believe me....it's worth it. And a great value for the price. I highly recommend it. (P.S. I'm a beginner....but I think it would work for anyone on a budget.)
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional machine, great features, easy to use & smooth stitch outs!!
customer_reviews.text: USB port to import designs is awesome!! The machine even lets you combine & customize designs & save to machine or USB for later as well. Easy to thread & wind bobbins. Comes with valuable user manual as well! Packaged well for shipping too.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannifer Hoskins

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for the price. It is so easy and so much fun.
customer_reviews.text: Liked this machine, easy to use, image screen a little to small to see patterns to make out from USB. But for an embroidery machine to begin on it is amazing and easy and I love it. I have a Topas Viking sewing and embroidery machine, I don't even use the Viking to embroider with any more this machine is so much better to use. Lorretta Erwin Az.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: You’ll love this upgrade from the discontinued PE770
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this machine. I had a PE770 and it broke and I ordered this in a panic to complete a job. I paid for the overnight shipping and it arrived the very next day. Packaging was sturdy and this machine is GREAT. It’s like the Cadillac of single needle machines.
customer_reviews.author: Bama007

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Machine
customer_reviews.text: I have to highly recommend this machine if you are just wanting an embroidery machine. It has done me well, and I am so very pleased with the results I get from the machine. I can not say enough good things about this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Gazmuth

customer_reviews.title: User friendly
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine for a beginner embroiderer, like me. The only downfall is I want to make my own quilt labels and the fonts on the machine cannot be adjusted small enough...So, I will have to buy another font program, otherwise I would have given this machine 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Gail M.

customer_reviews.title: I love this machine!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this embroidery machine! I've only done a couple projects so far, but they've turned out great and it is very easy to use. I looked for tips on Pinterest for some of the projects and I can't wait to use it more! It's a great addition to my crafting equipment!
customer_reviews.author: Marie J.

customer_reviews.title: Love my machine!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to machine embroidery. I LOVE the PE800!! It is very easy to learn the machine. The manuals are well written and the machine is simple to operate. AND, the price is very affordable as embroidery machines go. SO glad I chose this one!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: TOP CHOICE!
customer_reviews.text: I did so e homework before buying this machine and glad I did. This is a phenomenal embroidery machine with the color displace, ability to change thread colors and review PRIOR to embroider and has many hoop options available. I have really enjoyed the quality and functionality of this machine.
customer_reviews.author: SML

customer_reviews.title: Love it lots
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine. I had a singer that never worked right and broke constantly. This machine is wonderful and works beautifully. I had PTSD from the Singer I had and was listening to the Brother trying to determine when it was going to give out. It still going strong. I use it almost every day. Some I count never do with the Singer
customer_reviews.author: lynne wycoff

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I AM LOVING my new Embroidery Machine4x4. I love the 5x7 and I knew I would out grow the 4x4 real fast so I opted to purchase this PE800. I was able to create projects and with the help of You Tube. I am learning more and more. This is a GREAT machine.
customer_reviews.author: Carol P.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have the CORRECT parts
customer_reviews.text: Wrong embroidery unit was sent with this machine and some of the accessories were missing Unable to use without the correct parts
customer_reviews.author: Joni Stuessel

customer_reviews.title: Malfunction error first day
customer_reviews.text: Malfunction error first day, unusable. Could have been just a bad item, it happens. Called Brother for support or replacement. They could not help me unless I brought it to a Dealer. I informed them that the nearest dealer would be a 300 mile drive and not an option. Any shipping would be on me. Very disappointing Brother. Had to use Amazon return for my money back
customer_reviews.author: Ernest

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy it again
customer_reviews.text: 1st few embroideries came out perfect the last few the rope thread started jammy ripping and breaking Then the machine broke down I would never buy pe800 Ever again I have the SE625 is better than the PE 800
customer_reviews.author: david t rivera

customer_reviews.title: Still learning
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy, somewhat sensitive. Much easier to use brother embroidery thread than any other brand. I had bought coats embroidery thread but quickly threw that aside, it kept getting tangled
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Padgett-Murray

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great machine
customer_reviews.text: Only had it for little over a month and I was embroidering a project and in the middle of it doing the satin stitch it jammed and hand wheel wouldn't turn an made a loud noise. Amazon is sending a replacement asap. Thank you. Just recieved my replacement and it works great. Would highly recommend this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly carre

customer_reviews.title: Love this embroidery machine!
customer_reviews.text: WOW, love this machine. Insanely easy to use, LCD screen is easy to see and navigate. Easy to import images and extra hoop sizes can be purchased on Amazon. If you’re looking for an embroidery machine look no further!!!
customer_reviews.author: rnwes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this machine!! When I first used it I was nervous but the manual was very precise and it comes with a quick guide to get you started. It does beautiful work
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Scaife

customer_reviews.title: Awesome embroidery machine
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome machine. Easy to use and setup right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Stroud

customer_reviews.title: A real lemon.
customer_reviews.text: This machine has been a lemon from day one. It does nothing but make bird's nests. It goes to the shop for repairs constantly. Save your money for a good sewing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Adam A. Wanderer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to have more value in my skills as a sewer and this machine is amazing! I can't get enough of it it's something that defiantly takes a day to learn but once you get the hang of it and understand it more and read the handbook there no turning back on what kind of projects you can do. Its amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my new toy!
customer_reviews.text: This product is used for embroidering. I am a beginner, therefore, I wanted a machine that was user friendly. It was ready right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: L. Burnstein

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a 770 for years. It made me the family favorite for the Christmas grab bag! This is definitely is the machine for all the part time crafters. It’s faster, easy to use, and has a color screen. To all those newbies out there, there are tons of downloads that will work with this machine. I started with Julia’s Needle Designs. Good for beginners and they have always stitched out perfect. Go create!
customer_reviews.author: Annette Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Worth every $!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from my 30 yr. old Snoopy PE 200 to this new PE Brother 800. I could not wait to learning how to operate my new machine. In the beginning I was anxious because my old machine jammed up often. However, this machine works like a dream. The Manuel is quite clear with good illustrations. I love it more each time I try a new design. Highly recommend this model Brother for much pleasure. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Kittrell Elsaesser

customer_reviews.title: Very friendly and so many perks I can’t list
customer_reviews.text: I also have a se625. - this is a great machine. If you can afford it definitely get it and skip the smaller hoop. You can add designs to existing designs on the screen, move things around flip them. Awesome. The self threader is a real treat! I just love this machine.
customer_reviews.author: bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: Can’t believe how easy it was to embroider!!!! I’m new to this, I’ve never used a machine before but this was so easy to learn and to use. I’ve had it for about a month and I can’t stop embroidering!!! Such a great product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: GREAT machine
customer_reviews.text: I have never used an embroidery machine. I research many and decided on this one based on it reviews and the multiple size hoops that can be used. I purchased it along with a set of hoops. I have been producing tons of projects since day one! I have even learned how to create and sew custom projects since I purchased it. Great machine!
customer_reviews.author: K. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine, great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a few weeks ago after getting recommendations from several people, and absolutely love it! I'm completely new to embroidery (have been sewing for a few years though) and so far it's been a breeze to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mickella

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 2 days
customer_reviews.text: Needle threader broke 2nd day. Works great from an embroidery aspect. Easy to use. But if you have thread by hand each thread change that’s very frustrating. Returned and bought a berenina
customer_reviews.author: Mat

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this machine for 2 months and I already have half a million stitches on it. Each stitch perfect. The automatic needle threader has never failed and the back of my embroidery looks almost as good as the top. It’s a great machine. I can certainly understand why these sell out of stock every week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I was a beginner when I purchased my machine, I was making shirts within days of opening the box. Very user friendly and worth the price. Love the 5x7 hoop and you can always buy a re-positional hoop to do larger
customer_reviews.author: Lashonda Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! I started on a 1970 Kenmore machine and recently upgraded to this. I absolutely love this machine. It’s easy to use, comes with an easy to read manual and lots of accessories. I’m not sure I could make a complaint even if I wanted to. It arrived quickly and safely!
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: User friendly
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine! I upgraded from a 4x4 to this. I even had a husqvarna for a while, but it was very finicky. This machine is easy to learn and use.
customer_reviews.author: mommamerri

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the machine. It is user friendly - but I do recommend reading the manual. There are also some good videos on Youtube that show demonstrate some of the features of the machine. I would make sure to use the correct bobbins for this machine to make sure that you have a quality stitch. The machine used #15 bobbins. This is a quality machine at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: The best embroidery machine for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is my first embroidery machine! Love it!!! I have no words how easy it is! I’m enjoying the process and can’t stop to do my projects 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Zakharov

customer_reviews.title: Shipping sucked
customer_reviews.text: I love the machine, but was to be shipped two day. UPS drove around my neighborhood nearly a week before I received.
customer_reviews.author: Lara Hendon

customer_reviews.title: A must for those who emboider.
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine, I can now embroider more items for my business. Its easy to use and the automatic needle threader is a big help.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Jump in to purchase,dont delay.you wont be disapointed
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine.its so easy to use.the stitches are perfect everytime.I watched it for to long.when I finally jumped in,the poo rice went up the next day.that was disapointing,but so happy I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: karen cadorette

customer_reviews.title: Brother PE800
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to embroidery by machine. But I liked it when I was able to use. Still sketchy on how to do this. I need more lessons.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene H.

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing embroidery machine. It easy to learn how to use, operates smoothly, and I am enjoying all of the projects that I have completed with it. Jigh quality performance in a very economical machine. I have gotten so many compliments on the work I have done with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had to return.
customer_reviews.text: Thread kept breaking. Bobbin would not hold tension adjustment. Space by needle too small for large hands.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! Still learning but so far so good. Self taught so it’s very easy to just follow the instructions that were given.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Easy for beginners!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't write reviews all that often but for this I will. I am completely new to the world of embroidery but I was looking for a way to broaden my sewing creations. After doing a TON of research on a number of different models and brands I decided to go with the PE800, and let me tell you this machine did not disappoint. It has worked for me right out the box and has done a number of different projects so far. I couldn't say anything bad about the new edition to my sewing room.
customer_reviews.author: MotherOf3Monkeys

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I'm still getting to know the ends and out of this product but so far it stitches out excellent designs without much fuss.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Brother PE800 Embroidery Machine, 138 Built-in Designs, 5" x 7" Hoop Area, Large 3.2" LCD Touchscreen, USB Port, 11 Font Styles
product_meta.description:
If you’ve been searching for an embroidery machine that allows you to create dazzling embroidery designs, Brother offers an exceptional option. The Brother PE800 is an easy-to-use embroidery machine that features a 5” x 7” embroidery field for larger embroidery projects. This embroidery machine allows you to select from built-in embroidery designs or import your own from compatible sources. The PE800 embroidery machine features 138 built-in designs, including 10 frame designs and 11 built-in fonts (7 English, 3 Japanese, and 1 Cyrillic). Some of the designs include beautiful scrollwork, floral, and quilt patterns—plus 10 frame shapes and 14 border styles.

The Brother PE800 embroidery machine has been engineered with additional design editing features. This provides flexibility to rotate, mirror image, increase and decrease the size of your designs, and see how your edited designs look right on the color LCD touch display before stitching. The PE800 is easy to use and thread: simply follow the numbered threading diagram printed on the machine. An automatic needle threader saves time and reduces stress by pushing the thread right through the eye of the needle.

This embroidery machine also includes step-by-step tutorials that are shown right on the LCD touchscreen display. Some of the topics include how to thread the machine, how to attach the embroidery arm, and more. The Brother PE800 embroidery machine is perfect for home embroiderers who are looking for a fast, versatile, dedicated embroidery machine they can grow with them over time. A bilingual user manual, a 25-year limited warranty, and free customer phone and online technical support for the life of the product.
feature_bullets: 138 Built-in designs: Featuring 138 built-in embroidery designs including scrollwork, florals and quilt patterns, the PE800 has numerous options to allow your creativity to flourish
11 Built-in fonts: 7 English, 3 Japanese, and 1 Cyrillic font styles are perfect for monogramming and lettering
USB Port: The PE800's USB port allows you to import your embroidery designs into your machine's built-in memory
Large color touchscreen: The large 3.2" inch LCD color touchscreen allows you to preview your designs before embroidering
5" X 7" Embroidery field: This embroidery-only machine comes with an embroidery foot and a 5" x 7" inch embroidery hoop perfect for stitching larger designs
